articles.author: Zeke Miller and Julie Pace | AP
articles.title: US long watched Soleimani, but feared risks of a strike
articles.description: Previous presidents have considered whether to target Iranian Gen. Qassem Soleimani and decided against it
articles.content:
To avoid a firefight, and the contentious politics that would follow, I decided that we should monitor the caravan, not strike immediately, retired Gen. Stanley McChrystal wrote last year in Foreign Policy.
Fears about the repercussions and reverberations of… [+4063 chars]

articles.author: Ben Fox | AP
articles.title: Legal basis for US killing of Iran general depends on threat
articles.description: It's not clear whether President Donald Trump had the legal authority to order the killing of a top Iranian general in Iraq
articles.content: In its limited explanation so far, the Pentagon said Gen. Qassem Soleimani was actively developing plans to kill American diplomats and service members when he was killed in a U.S. drone strike Friday near the Baghdad airport shortly after arriving in the cou… [+5482 chars]

articles.author: Carolyn Hax
articles.title: Carolyn Hax: How to get over your awkwardness with your mother-in-law
articles.description: Go to her hospital room and show her how wonderful you really are.
articles.content:
Adapted from an online discussion.
Dear Carolyn: My husband is overseas for work, and his mother has been hospitalized with double pneumonia. He has asked me to go check on her every day and then, if necessary, coordinate help for her when she gets home. He … [+2823 chars]

articles.author: Associated Press
articles.title: Hong Kong steps up response to mystery disease from China
articles.description: Hong Kong authorities have activated a newly created "serious response" level as fears spread about a mysterious infectious disease that may have been brought back by visitors to a mainland Chinese city
articles.content:
The outbreak has revived memories of the 2002-2003 SARS epidemic, which started in southern China and killed more than 700 people in the mainland, Hong Kong and elsewhere.
The serious response level indicates a moderate impact on Hong Kongs population. It is… [+565 chars]
